name: YunasJapaneseanimationcabin
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yunas japanese animation cabin
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Review new animations, recommend, and news

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open yunas Japanese animation cabin” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, open yunas Japanese animation cabin"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open yunas Japanese animation cabin."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the open yunas Japanese animation cabin board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
